name: Waluigi Goes To Get Some Groceries At 7-Twentyone
name_original: Waluigi Goes To Get Some Groceries At 7-Twentyone
description:
A themed enhancement (but buggy version) of Infinite Platformer (Generator) by ScratchStang for Waluijam, hosted by Dave Pickett. I only found out about it very late into the contest. I was also considering things like a minigame compilation, and even making my entry in The Games Factory 1.06 to provide the Vitalize plugin with a long-due new software title. Other than me, it's unloved. So sad. :'(

To always have the latest version, go here, where the game is playable right in the browser. I recommend checking there for any additional features, bugfixes or anything else, as I don't plan to maintain updates here. As of writing, I'm planning to add Waluigi sprites I palette swapped from an 8x8 Luigi sprite by Johan Vinet.
